unnormalised: Breaking: Huge opportunity for investment! A posh 3BHK flat in Bandra West, Mumbai, is up for grabs. Located near Lilavati Hospital, the address is Flat no. 4, Sea View Apartments, Carter Road, Bandra West, Mumbai - 400050. The asking price? A cool Rs. 8.5 crores!
normalised: Breaking: Huge opportunity for investment! A posh three B-H-K flat in Bandra West, Mumbai, is up for grabs. Located near Lilavati Hospital, the address is Flat number four, Sea View Apartments, Carter Road, Bandra West, Mumbai - four hundred thousand and fifty. The asking price? A cool rupee eight point five crores!

unnormalised: Real estate sources tell us the property boasts stunning sea views and is close to many restaurants. It's a freehold property, perfect for families or even as an investment. Don't miss out; properties in this area don't stay on the market for long. Contact Rohan Sharma at 9820XXXXXX for a site visit.
